Package fr.unice.polytech.citadelle.game_engine

Class RoundManager

java.lang.Object
fr.unice.polytech.citadelle.game_engine.RoundManager
public class RoundManager extends Object
The RoundManager manage the rounds inside a Game
Author:
BONNET Kilian, IMAMI Ayoub, KARRAKCHOU Mourad, LE BIHAN LÃ©o

  • Constructor Details

    • RoundManager

      public RoundManager(ArrayList<Character> listOfAllCharacter, ArrayList<Behaviour> listOfAllBehaviour, LinkedHashMap<Character,Optional<Behaviour>> hashOfCharacter, Board board)
      Instantiate a RoundManager object.
      Parameters:
      listOfAllCharacter - The list filled with all the characters.
      listOfAllBehaviour - The list filled with all the behaviours.
      hashOfCharacter - The hash list associating a character with his behaviour.
      board - The game board.

  • Method Details

    • runRounds

      public ArrayList<Behaviour> runRounds()
      Run a round while the game is not finished.
      Parameters:
      phaseManager - Class used to analyze the Game to deduct a particular phase.
      Returns:
      The game leaderBoard.

    • getTheListOfCity

      public ArrayList<City> getTheListOfCity(ArrayList<Player> listOfPlayer)
      Get the city of each player.
      Parameters:
      listOfPlayer - The list of all players.
      Returns:
      The list of each player's city.

    • setupCharacters

      public void setupCharacters()
      Initialise the deck of character then for each behaviour, choose a characterCard.

    • chooseACharacterCard

      public void chooseACharacterCard(Behaviour bot, DeckCharacter deckCharacter)
      Player will choose a character card according to its associated behaviour and the round of the game.
      Parameters:
      bot - The given bot to take a character card.
      deckCharacter - The current deck of character to choose a character card from.

    • chooseCharacter

      public Character chooseCharacter(Behaviour bot, DeckCharacter deckCharacter)

    • isThereAFamily

      public int isThereAFamily(Behaviour bot)
      Check if the player of the given bot has a family in its city.
      Parameters:
      bot - The given bot to check.
      Returns:
      the integer index value of the family owned by the bot. Return -1 if bot does not own any family.

    • askEachCharacterToPlay

      public ArrayList<Behaviour> askEachCharacterToPlay()
      According to the Citadels rule, RoundManager will ask a character to play. If a player own a called character, associated behaviour will play for the player.
      Parameters:
      phaseManager - Class used to analyze the Game to deduct a particular phase.
      Returns:
      The game leaderBoard (modified if a player complete its city).

    • actionOfBehaviour

      public void actionOfBehaviour(Behaviour currentBehaviour)
      Return the character action according the player behaviour and if the player is not kill.
      Parameters:
      currentBehaviour - The behaviour associated to the player.

    • cityVerification

      public void cityVerification(Behaviour currentBehaviour, ArrayList<Behaviour> leaderBoard)
      Check if a player's city is completed.
      Parameters:
      currentBehaviour - The given player behaviour to process.
      leaderBoard - Updating the leaderboard if the player complete its city.

    • updateLeaderboard

      public void updateLeaderboard(Behaviour currentBehaviour, ArrayList<Behaviour> leaderBoard)
      If the city is completed updateLeaderboard will be called. updateLeaderboard will add the player that trigger the event (by completing its city) to the leaderboard. currentPhase will be also changed to the LAST_TURN_PHASE.
      Parameters:
      currentBehaviour - The associated player behaviour who have completed its city.
      leaderBoard - The game leaderboard.

    • updateListOfBehaviour

      public void updateListOfBehaviour()
      Updating the list of behaviour to let the player's behaviour having the king card to play the first.

    • findKing

      public int findKing(ArrayList<Behaviour> listOfBehaviour)
      Check which player has the king character.
      Parameters:
      listOfBehaviour - The list of the behaviours.
      Returns:
      The index on the player list of the player having the king character. -1 if no one has the king card.

    • orderListOfPlayer

      public ArrayList<Behaviour> orderListOfPlayer(ArrayList<Behaviour> listOfBehaviour, int positionOfKingHolder)
      Order properly the player's behaviour order according to their character card (eh. king should be playing the first)
      Parameters:
      listOfBehaviour - The list of player's behaviour.
      positionOfKingHolder - The position of the king on the player's behaviour list.
      Returns:
      The ordered player's behaviour list.

    • reviveAll

      public void reviveAll()
      Revive all killed players.

    • getListOfPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getListOfPlayers()

    • getListOfBehaviour

      public ArrayList<Behaviour> getListOfBehaviour()

      public ArrayList<Character> getListOfAllCharacters()

      public LinkedHashMap<Character,Optional<Behaviour>> getHashOfCharacters()

      public Board getBoard()
